summary: This is an FBI Electronic Communication (FD-1057) summarizing an interview conducted on August 14, 2007, in West Palm Beach, Florida, as part of a federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors. The document details an interview with a female who described being recruited to provide massages to Jeffrey Epstein, during which he masturbated. It also describes the recruitment process involving Epstein's assistants.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the federal investigation into sexual exploitation of minors. The interviewee was introduced to him to provide massages, during which he masturbated.

persons.name: Elejandra
persons.context: Described as a very pretty Hispanic female in her early twenties, with long brown hair, and approximately 5'5" to 5'6" tall. The interviewee provided her telephone number to Elejandra at Epstein's residence.

connections.description: Elejandra is identified as one of Epstein's assistants who was present at his residence and to whom the interviewee provided contact information.

events.title: Initial Introduction to Epstein
events.description: The interviewee was introduced to Jeffrey Epstein for the purpose of providing him with personal massages. She was approached at a party by an unidentified female.

events.title: First Massage Incident with Epstein
events.description: The interviewee traveled to Epstein's Palm Beach residence by taxi. During the massage, Epstein removed his robe, masturbated, and climaxed. She was paid $200. Epstein did not touch her during that specific massage.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim/Witness
events.description: The FBI interviewed an individual in West Palm Beach, Florida, regarding the federal investigation into the sexual exploitation of minors involving Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Shell Gas Station near Okeechobee Boulevard and the Florida Turnpike
keyFacts: The interviewee was introduced to Jeffrey Epstein in 2003 or 2004 for the purpose of providing him with personal massages.
During the first massage at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, Epstein masturbated and climaxed. The interviewee was paid $200 and stated Epstein did not touch her during that incident.
The interviewee believed she was close to turning sixteen when first meeting Epstein but told him she was eighteen.
Epstein's assistant, Elejandra, is identified as a point of contact for scheduling massages.
The document is an FBI record of an interview conducted in 2007 as part of the federal investigation into Epstein for sexual exploitation of minors.
